title: SetMaxNum (Method)
text:
METHOD SetMaxNum : BOOL
Sets the maximum number of client creatable objects of given type.

rows.Name: objType
rows.Comment:
object type, actually supported OBJ_ANALOG_INPUT := 0 ..
OBJ_LIGHTING_OUTPUT := 54

rows:
maximum number of client creatable objects of given type, -1
=> no limits, 0 => not allowed
